## ClassificationResult interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Result of classifying a change with a policy.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ClassificationResult extends ClassifiedChange 
```
**Extends:** [ClassifiedChange](./change-detector-core.classifiedchange.md)

## Remarks

This type extends ClassifiedChange which contains the full change data plus the release type and matched rule info. The `change` property is provided for backward compatibility but is effectively the same as `this`<!-- -->.

New code should use ClassifiedChange directly.
